public class ISA
extends java.lang.Object

Instruction Set Architecture for TargetCode to Assembly Code or Binary Code

作者：
ZongZiWang

方法摘要
static java.lang.String getAsmCode(Code code, SymbolTable argu)
          get Assembly Code of 'code' in the context of 'argu'
static java.lang.String getBinCode(Code code)
          get Binary Code of 'code'
static java.lang.String[] getDst(Code code)
          get destination register keys of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'

          get dual expression of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'
static int getLength(int _codeOp)
          get instruction length of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'
static java.lang.String[] getRegKey(Code code)
          get all register keys of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'

          get single assignment of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'

          get source register keys of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'

get dual expression of code whose opcode is '_codeOp'

参数：
_codeOp -
返回：
dual expression like 'Z = X op Y'
